attack1: Luna: A-ha! The fun has been doubled!
attack2: Pinkie Pie: Look, a double me!
attack4: Rainbow Dash: That's it! All bets are off!
defuse3: Pinkie Pie: The Element Of Laughter
defuse5: Rainbow Dash: The Element Of Loyalty
defuse6: Twilight Sparkle: The Element Of Magic
favor1: Applejack: I could really use your help.
favor2: Trixie: The Great and Powerful Trixie requires a little assistance.
favor4: Fluttershy: I-If you wouldn't mind, that is...
future1: Future Twilight: Actually, I'm from next Tuesday morning.
future2: Pinkie Pie: You will get a really cool birthday present next year...
future3: Pinkie Pie: The twitchin' means my Pinkie Sense is telling me that stuff's gonna start falling!
future4: Starlight Glimmer: I only saw what you showed me! Who knows what'll really happen?
future5: Spike: So, a man of mystery, huh? I'm keeping my eye on you!
yup5: Mudbriar: Technically, it's not your turn yet.
shuffle1: Discord: Looks like we might be due for a big old storm of chaos!
shuffle2: Fluttershy: Oh... okay then... Mix it up!
shuffle3: Twilight Sparkle: From one to another, another to one. A mark of one's destiny singled out alone, fulfilled.
skip1: Trixie: You will never have the amazing, show-stopping ability of the Great and Powerful Trixie!
